page.title: 18A SCHOOL NEAR WOODFORD
page.content: Our school is in an old manor house. In the grounds are lots of trees including a big plane tree on which we all play . Behind this tree is the River Avon. There are 59 girls in the school & I am in a dormitory of 10 girls. We have 4 matrons to look after us. We get up at half past seven and go down to breakfast at ten to eight. After breakfast we have prayers at ten to nine then we go into class. We have three lessons before break. During break we groom our ponies and clean out our pets. After break we have more lessons until lunch. In the afternoon we have activities such as riding, dancing, art and games,then we have tea. After tea we do our prep until half past six when the bell goes for supper:we wash our hands, put on our pinnies and go downstairs. After supper we go upstairs to bed.
